sentence.Network_en: Podulski had been assiduous in learning his adopted language.

sentence.Network_en: The book was the result of ten years'assiduous research.
sentence.Network_cn: 那本书是十年苦心钻研的成果.

sentence.Network_en: His spirit of assiduous study is worthy of emulation.
sentence.Network_cn: 他刻苦钻研的精神,值得效法.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin assiduus, from assidere 'be engaged in doing' (see assess), + -ous

entry.tran: 刻苦的；勤奋的；兢兢业业的
entry.def: Someone who is assiduous works hard or does things very thoroughly.

example.ex: Podulski had been assiduous in learning his adopted language.
example.tran: 波多斯基一直很努力地学习外语。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by care and persistent effort;

sentences.sentence: "sedulous pursuit of legal and moral principles"

auth_sentence.content: It was a tribute to her assiduous political work.
auth_sentence.res_content: It was a tribute to her assiduous political work.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It was a tribute to her assiduous political work.

auth_sentence.content: I certainly wasn't an assiduous student.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I certainly wasn't an assiduous student.

auth_sentence.content: Selwyn Lloyd...worked with assiduous and skilful diplomacy.
auth_sentence.res_content: Selwyn Lloyd...worked with assiduous and skilful diplomacy.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Selwyn Lloyd...worked with assiduous and skilful diplomacy.

stems_affixes.word_buile: as一再+sid坐+uous多……的→一再坐着[学习] →勤奋的
dis分开+sid坐+ent……的→分开坐→意见不同
in内+sid坐+ious……的→坐在内部的→不为人知的,阴险的
re再+sid坐+ual表形容词→一再坐再旁边的→多余的
sed=sid坐+ulous多……的→坐得多得→勤奋得
sub次一等,副手+sid旁边+iary→下面旁边的辅助的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意见不同,政见不同,异议
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis分开+sid坐+ence表名词→分开坐→意见不同
dis分开+sid坐+ent……的→分开坐→意见不同

stems_affixes.value_cn: 剩余[财产];残余,渣滓,滤渣
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+sid放置+ue→[不能用]放回去→残余
sub在下面+sid旁边+y→下面旁边[不是主要的收入]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 考虑,细想;体谅,顾及;认为,把…看作
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+sid坐+er→坐在一起→考虑到
s一再+sid坐+uous多……的,有……的→一再坐着[学习] →勤奋的
con共同+tig接触+uous多……的,有……的→互相接触的→接壤的
pro多+misc混淆+uous多……的,有……的→很多混合在一起→杂乱的
vac空+uous多……的,有……的→adj.发呆的,无意义的

means.word_mean: 专心致志的, 勤勉的

sentences.en: The book was the result of ten years’ assiduous research.
sentences.cn: 那本书是十年苦心钻研的成果。
